constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H52-H53]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CALVERT:
H.R. 77.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution relating to the power to
[[Page H53]]
make all laws necessary and proper for carrying out the
powers vested in Congress.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: ADA Compliance for Customer Entry to Stores and Services Act
